author: jleroux
msg: Maxlength via HTML attribute maxlength for Product Store.title is configured as 60. ProductStore.title can store up to 100 characters in the database
jleroux: true also for the store name, both are of SQL type name which is 100 VARCHAR

author: jleroux
msg: Reverts r1592530 for OFBIZ-5637 "Cannot receive PO shipment"
A change introduced by SVN commit r1345532 in the inline JavaScript snippet in ReceiveInventoryAgainstPurchaseOrder.ftl causes an error while receiving PO into the facility.
